Title: Three Complete Novels.
Subtitle: A Lloyd Alexander Collection.
Authors: Lloyd Alexander.
Categories: Juvenile Fiction.
Thumbnail: http://books.google.com/books/content?id=jFcAAAAACAAJ&printsec=frontcover&img=1&zoom=1&source=gbs_api.
Description: Lucian flees the wrath of his king and joins a poet-turned-jackass and a girl with mystical powers; Prince Jen sets off for the court of Yuan-Min bearing six unusual gifts; and King Tamar embarks on a quest to recover his kingdom, which he lost in a dicegame..
